document_data.name: ''Maelstrom's Punch''
document_data.mainbody: '''Maelstrom's Punch''' was the specialty alcoholic drink from [[The Track]] in the city of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Description: Maelstrom's Punch was a quite mundane and average libation brewed in-house by The Track's employees. What made it standout among many other swirls was the [[sorcerer]] who placed minor [[enchantment]]s on each batch that highbred the drinker's senses.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Maelstrom's Punch was created in and popularized by the Track, the underground racing rink, and gambling establishment on the [[Market Triangle]] of Westgate.
